about.title: About Combogó
about.p1: Combogó is a major extension project of the Digital Games course at the Catholic University of Pernambuco. We work in the fields of Design, Computing, and Games.
about.p2: Founded in October 2016, Combogó Unicap is an interactive solutions agency dedicated to developing creative solutions for real-world problems through innovation and ingenuity.
about.card.title: Projects
